original_text: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean, behold, the men which were sent from Cornelius had made enquiry for Simon's house, and stood before the gate,
korean_text: 베드로가 본 바 환상이 무슨 뜻인지 속으로 의아해 하더니 마침 고넬료가 보낸 사람들이 시몬의 집을 찾아 문 밖에 서서

sentences.original_text: Now while Peter doubted in himself
what this vision which he had seen should mean
sentences.korean_translation: 자기가 본 이 환상이 무엇을 의미할까

sentences.original_text: men which were sent from Cornelius
had made enquiry for Simon's house
